code: import{combineReducers}from'redux';import User from'./reducerUser';import Student from'./reducerStudent';var appReducer=combineReducers({state:function state(){var _state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};return _state;},User:User,Student:Student});var rootReducer=function rootReducer(state,action){if(action.type==='USER_LOGOUT'){state=undefined;}return appReducer(state,action);};export default rootReducer;
